title: Plat 3 Support Main LF ADC Duo
body:
Hey, support main here. As of writing this I'm Plat 3 52LP in solo, Diamond in 5s.

Have mained support for the entire duration of my league career... (yes level 1 to plat 3) am looking for someone who is passionate and highly skilled at adc to duo with! I play 95% of supports (both conventional and unconventional), have experience with them all in ranked and am looking to gain elo! Really wanting to push Diamond in the near future :] 

Have TS/Skype, only talk English sorry.

Cheers 

IGN: Master Baits

replies.body:
Hey, 
Plat 3
Was previously a jungle main, but decided to switch over to adc recently, however I have always been comfortable playing adc
I have been plat since early season 5
I am decent at most adcs but I am most comfortable on {{champion:236}} {{champion:110}} and {{champion:222}} 
My goal is to climb to eventually climb to diamond
If you want to duo, feel free to add me in game, IGN: Satanic Chicken
